13d1eb27-52f9-46d6-90c7-bf2f818e195f.description: Earners of this badge have participated as a member of a Music Ensemble, delivered by Brighton & Hove Music & Arts. The earner has shown commitment to attend rehearsals, developed musical skills and responded to feedback to improve technical and ensemble skills. The earner has developed knowledge and awareness of different musical skills and worked as part of a team.
13d1eb27-52f9-46d6-90c7-bf2f818e195f.name: Brighton & Hove Music & Arts Ensemble Member

alignments.name: Cities of Learning Badge Standard - Participate Layer
alignments.description: This badge has been mapped to the Participate Layer of the Cities of Learning Badge Standard. Earners meet expectations, can interact with learning and are able to join in with others.

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has developed their musical skills, demonstrated evidence of practicing their part and increased their confidence in performance Detail the event the person participated in an event on coding.
The earner actively engaged in rehearsals, taking responsibility for setting up and packing down, being on time and being an active part of a team
The earner regularly attended rehearsals and showed commitment to the ensemble
Brighton and Hove Music and Arts County Oak Ave, Brighton BN1 8DJ
Open to all who are already playing an instrument

01cbd93a-76f9-45b5-8c9e-f1874af115e3.description: The earner of this badge demonstrated their skills by taking part in a public performance as a member of one of Brighton & Hove Music & Arts music ensembles. In order to be ready for the performance the earner attended regular rehearsals three months prior to the event, prepared the required musical material through rehearsals and personal practice. The earner actively utliised their musical skills and demonstrated a good understanding of performance conventions in a real world setting.
01cbd93a-76f9-45b5-8c9e-f1874af115e3.name: Brighton & Hove Music & Arts Ensemble Performer

alignments.name: Cities of Learning Badge Standard - Demonstrate Layer
alignments.description: This badge has been mapped to the Demonstrate Layer of the Cities of Learning Badge Standard. Earners show consistency in their approach and can apply knowledge with real world context to receive feedback and develop.

badge_template_activities.title: The earner performed for, and responded to, a live audience, demonstrating an understanding of performance conventions, including appropriate behaviors and dress for the setting of the performance.
The earner has attended rehearsals and fully engaged in activities in order to prepare and be a participant in the ensemble.
The earner demonstrated their organisational skills, being punctual and arriving with the required musical equipment and concert dress
The earner has developed their musical skills to a high level. They have shown personal commitment to learn new music, practicing their part to achieve the standard required to perform in public.
Brighton and Hove Music and Arts County Oak Ave, Brighton BN1 8DJ
Open to all who are already playing an instrument

21cfa33d-76ab-46d5-bdb9-7be1ec323d50.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated a high level of musical, personal and social skills to take ownership of a leadership role within an ensemble, as a section leader, peer mentor and/or young music leader. The earner has set a positive example to peers, modelling the expected attitudes and behaviours of an ensemble member, while inspiring and supporting other young musicians to develop new skills through demonstration and giving effective instruction and guidance.
21cfa33d-76ab-46d5-bdb9-7be1ec323d50.name: Brighton & Hove Music & Arts Ensemble Leader

issuer.summary: issued by Brighton and Hove Music and Arts and authorized by Future Creators

entity.name: Brighton and Hove Music and Arts

alignments.name: Cities of Learning Badge Standard - Lead Layer
alignments.description: This badge has been mapped to the Lead Layer of the Cities of Learning Badge Framework. Earners are able to take ownership embedding their knowledge in different contexts and using their capabilities to inspire and influence others.

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has shown a high level of proficiency on their chosen musical instrument, and the ability to demonstrate and support others to make good technical/musical progress
The earner has volunteered for additional responsibilities/roles that support the running of the ensemble eg managing music library, setting up and giving extra mentoring to help peers progress

The earner is a valued member of the group, supporting both staff and other members. They are flexible and quick to engage in problem solving, helping to resolve potential musical, logistic or social challenges.
The earner attends rehearsals regularly, always with a positive and focused attitude. Their behaviour in rehearsals sets a good example to others and enables effective running of the group.
Brighton and Hove Music and Arts County Oak Ave, Brighton BN1 8DJ
Open to all who are already playing an instrument

070712be-a70c-447d-9bc8-54e291533f37.description: Earners of this badge have participated in an Orchestra 360 course, an inclusive, creative music group for young people with special educational needs/disabilities, delivered by Brighton & Hove Music & Arts. The earner has deepened their knowledge of the skills required to take part in a music ensemble, showing they can listen and work well in a group. The earner developed specific technical skills on at least one instrument in preparation for the end of course performance.
070712be-a70c-447d-9bc8-54e291533f37.name: Brighton & Hove Music & Arts Orchestra 360 Member

b54d103f-d2e7-4edc-a6ea-4fab84e485df.description: Earners of this badge have taken part in a public performance as part of Orchestra 360 an inclusive creative music group for young people with special educational needs/disabilities, delivered by Brighton & Hove Music & Arts. The earner prepared the required musical material and demonstrated their musical skills and confidence in a new setting in front of a live audience.
b54d103f-d2e7-4edc-a6ea-4fab84e485df.name: Brighton & Hove Music & Arts Orchestra 360 Performer

a4795969-deb0-4d38-b4ba-c0db0e88f0c2.description: Earners of this badge have participated in regular Music Space sessions delivered by Brighton and Hove Music and Arts. The earner has demonstrated they can listen and work well with others.

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has demonstrated a commitment to personal growth and using their creativity as a tool for self-expression.
The earner attended approx 4 sessions of activity outside of school time, participating in various musical experiences
The earner has successfully completed a pathway to their musical development through exploring instrument learning, vocal technique and music production
Brighton and Hove Music and Arts County Oak Ave, Brighton BN1 8DJ

713b4b1b-6f1c-4fff-b41e-c384d6ca5402.description: The earner demonstrated a strong ability and consistency to further create and explore music through the use of technologies and instruments, as part of regular drop-ins to Music Space, delivered by Brighton & Hove Music & Arts. By committing to a musical discipline, as well as to their own growth through self-expression, the earner was able to receive and implement feedback, and applied in a real world environment, the confidence, skills and abilities that are necessary for an engaged musician
713b4b1b-6f1c-4fff-b41e-c384d6ca5402.name: Brighton & Hove Music & Arts Our Future Music Applied Musician

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has maintained and grown a significant portfolio of creative ideas and performative works, demonstrating the musical and personal progress they have made, collecting and applying feedback from peers
The earner has demonstrated confidence and professionalism in performing their ideas/presenting their portfolio of work to an audience of peers and/or music centre staff.
The earner has demonstrated a consistent and punctual commitment to attend and participate in the youth music centre’s drop-in sessions.
The earner has researched a variety of music activities, using the information gathered to inform decision making for their music progression goals.

edb61d43-cdcb-497a-a3dd-52ae7110a6b3.description: Earners of this badge have successfully completed a Young Leaders course at Orchestra 360, an inclusive creative music group for young people with special educational needs/disabilities, delivered by Brighton & Hove Music & Arts. The course enabled the earner to develop their musical, personal and facilitation skills. The earner is able to inspire and support other young musicians in rehearsals and performances and take a leading musical role, playing at least one instrument confidently.
edb61d43-cdcb-497a-a3dd-52ae7110a6b3.name: Brighton & Hove Music & Arts Orchestra 360 Young Leader

badge_template_activities.title: The earner is a valued member of the group and acts as an ambassador to promote the activity to others. The earner has welcomed and supported new members to participate. Detail the course activities that the earner completed and led.

The earner has volunteered for additional responsibilities that support the smooth running of Orchestra 360, which include recruiting new members, sharing skills with others, administrative tasks, serving refreshments and setting up and packing away.
The earner has shown competence in at least one instrument and is able to play the same part accurately, in time both in rehearsal and performance situations
The earner is able to set up and assemble the required musical /technical equipment and is able to troubleshoot and solve common problems that may occur.
